amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike Sec. 506 from the bill which prohibits DOE from closing Yucca Mountain.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in the Congressional Record to strike Section 506 which relates to the Yucca Mountain Geologic Repository License Application.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Titus amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 96 - 326 (Roll no. 386).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Titus amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 96 - 326 (Roll no. 386).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A039) offered by Ms. Titus.
